HI, A copper wire run outside for an antenna works great, my shop is metal =
and i cannot pick station only about a mile away, so i ran a 12 gauge insul=
ated wire about 125 feet long, i live in the Lake Charles, Louisiana area a=
nd can now receive stations from several states away.=A0 You can also conne=
ct to most Cable TV Systems=A0and receive many stations.
David
--- On Mon, =
11/2/09, purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:


From: purpl=
espacefriend <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Question fo=
r you all
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, November 2, 2009, 7:56 =
PM


Thanks! We just moved--senior citizens and we just bought our first ho=
use! so just got e-mail back up yesterday. 

It's so freaking ironic! The h=
ouse is like a faraday cage, it's all metal construction, metal frame, and =
even in between the frame is sheet metal, then the insulation and other rju=
nk. It didn't dawn on me till after we moved in and I tried to listen to AM=
 radio. There almost nothing for AM reception in the middle of the house, a=
nd in the bathroom you have to set the radio on the floor, in just the righ=
t spot to listen to C2C. The garage, where I intend to build my workshop is=
 the same.=A0 AWWWWWW crap! Think I'll be getting the saws all out and taki=
ng out some metal panels in the gatrage.

The house was made in '47, and I =
think it's surplus battle ship from WWII!

F-S

=A0 =A0=A0=A0Just because "Science" doesn't accept certain evidience, does =
not mean that it's not evidcence. I think the amount of evidence for the pa=
ranormal, EVP and survival is so mind boggling over whelming that only an i=
diot would be able ignore it. Yet skeptics close their eyes and ears and co=
ntinue to claim there is no evidnce. I say screw 'em, I'm not wasting time =
trying to prove something to supposedly educated people like that. 
>

cerned. That doesn't mean that your wrong, it just means that it doesn't co=
nstitute any kind of proof in the scientific world.
>=A0=A0=A0>

d cassette tapes, so I'm not going to post them here anytime soon. But duri=
ng multiple sessions, my mother and I both hear Gordy several times in a ro=
w. The odds seem against that happening from plain radio alone.
>=A0=A0=A0>=

s they are not encased in a body. They are pure energy, therefore by their =
very nature they manipulate electromagnetic fields. We are incased in this =
flesh, so it is much harder for us to manipulate the EMF like a ghost can.

>=A0=A0=A0> > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > I don'=
t know for sure it was my dad's friend. But I find it hard to believe that =
entities on the other side who are not dead people would go to so much trou=
ble to impersonate my dead friends and relatives -- why bother? If they tru=
ly seek attention, why not come up with something more attention-getting th=
an my dad's friend? Why not impersonate my brother, who is really the one I=
'm trying to reach? And anyways, there are hundreds and hundreds of stories=
 of people believing they have seen or heard or spoken to the ghost of thei=
r dead family members (my mother being one of them). They can't all be wish=
ful thinking.
>=A0=A0=A0> > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > I find it much easier to believe=
 that I'm somehow unconsciously making this happen (via the process Phenom =
Investigator describes) using the box. But since it's equally possible for =
me or a discarnate dead person to influence the box (via me and PK) (becaus=
e, after all, we are no different from the dead people except we still have=
 our bodies), I will probably never know if it's me or them making it happe=
n. 
>=A0=A0=A0> > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > I do know that I hear things on the tape t=
hat are repeated over and over and over again, in some cases twelve times i=
n a row, which tends to rule out pareidolia. I also have very clear sentenc=
es which anyone -- ANYONE -- without prompting could understand and hear (I=
've tested this with friends and family, letting them listen and asking wha=
t they hear). And, like I've said, the names I've gotten have mostly been o=
f obscure dead friends and relatives, not the ones I'm trying so desperatel=
y to contact.
>=A0=A0=A0> > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > So I'm leaning toward the dead p=
eople theory for now.
>=A0=A0=A0> > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps.com, "April Abercrombie" <april@> wrote:
>=A0=A0=A0> > >

 Maybe you're not, but most EVP's you hear are just matrixng, which is why =
mostly no one hears what the person recorded it thinks that they hear.

know for sure that it is your dad's friend?

=A0=A0> > > Well, I would disagree with the idea I'm hearing what I want to=
 hear. The first time I got my dad's friend Gordy, I didn't even hear his n=
ame; I thought he was saying "Forty, forty, forty." It was only in a later =
session that he identified himself again using his full proper name. Then I=
 realized that he is now dead (last I saw him he was very much alive), and =
that he'd been saying Gordy all along (confirmed by playing back the old ta=
pe). I certainly didn't expect to hear him come through, and yet he did, so=
 I can't see how I could've expected to hear his name.
>=A0=A0=A0> > > 
>=
=A0=A0=A0> > > Jill

oups.com, "phenom_investigator" <phenom_investigator@> wrote:

ree in that PK is responsible for most true EVPs.

ubject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Question for you all
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > 
>=A0=A0=A0>=
 > > > > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > If we presume that much of what is heard is i=
n fact the result of personal PK and not a discarnate voice, we may have an=
 answer to the question of why some sourcse communicate and others do not.
=
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > I would suggest that while the ope=
rator may produce the voice phenomena, that operator may indeed be influenc=
ed by external agents. This could include discarnate agents. 
>=A0=A0=A0> >=
 > > > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > When you carefully consider what is being heard=
, the themes often seem to reflect what may be subconscious concerns of the=
 operator or the listener. If external sources additionally inform this pro=
cess of perception, it is quite possible they influence both what is record=
ed and how is later perceived. This would also nicely explain why some peop=
le hear the same things on a recording while others hear quite different th=
ings and more importantly while one person hears different things from the =
same recording at different times.
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > >=
 It would also remove the requirement that discarnates manifest the phenome=
na. If discarnates are indeed non-physical, it is unclear how they would mo=
dify the physical world. On the other hand, we have good evidence demonstra=
ting the ability of living individuals to alter their environments in profo=
und ways, apparently with their minds. So it seems to make more sense that =
this might indeed by the underlying mechanism to EVPs rather than discarnat=
e manipulations.
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > --- In EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com, "mrscaptainjack2" <jjkamp@> wrote:
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > >I'm =
wondering if a haunting-type situation such as yours would be different fro=
m talking to your ancestors four or five generations back? I guess I'm just=
 wondering out loud what makes us connect with some entities, no matter how=
 obscure or nonexistent the connection, and not others? What makes some "tu=
ne in" to talk to us, or hang around on a plane closest to us...or what? At=
 least in a haunting, you'd be getting the entity that happened to reside a=
t that location.
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > > Never mind me=
, guys. I just have this driving need to understand how all this works, and=
 I don't think it's possible.
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > > =
Jill
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > >

people, what is the oldest person you've spoken to (in terms of how long ag=
o they died)?
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > > > > 
>=A0=A0=A0> > > > > > > > I'm wond=
ering because my great uncle has been coming through a lot, and he was murd=
ered in 1942. Since I wasn't born until decades later, I never knew him, bu=
t I do understand that people come through we did not know in life. Has any=
one else contacted someone claiming to have lived that far back? Or in anot=
her lifetime entirely?
